mapper.select: SELECT * FROM USE_REVW ORDER BY USE_REVW_WRITE_DAY

SELECT p.pur_his_order_no, p.pur_his_price, p.pur_his_pur_day,pur_his_sale_count, CASE WHEN p.plant_sale_no = 0 THEN k.kit_name ELSE s.plant_sale_title END AS product_name FROM pur_his p LEFT OUTER JOIN kit k ON (p.kit_no = k.kit_no) LEFT OUTER JOIN plant_sale s ON (p.plant_sale_no = s.plant_sale_no) WHERE p.mem_email = #{mem_email} AND p.PUR_HIS_ORDER_NO = #{pur_his_order_no}
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(USE_REVW_COMM_NO)+1,1) AS USE_REVW_COMM_NO FROM USE_REVW_COMM
INSERT INTO USE_REVW_COMM(USE_REVW_COMM_NO, MEM_NAME, MEM_EMAIL, USE_REVW_COMM_CON, USE_REVW_NO) VALUES(#{use_revw_comm_no},#{mem_name},#{mem_email},#{use_revw_comm_con},#{use_revw_no})
mapper.select: SELECT U.USE_REVW_NO, U.USE_REVW_TITLE, U.USE_REVW_CON, U.MEM_NAME, U.MEM_EMAIL, U.USE_REVW_HIT, USE_REVW_WRITE_DAY, U.USE_REVW_ORI_ROU, U.USE_REVW_PHY_ROU, U.PUR_HIS_ORDER_NO FROM USE_REVW U JOIN PUR_HIS P ON(U.PUR_HIS_ORDER_NO = P.PUR_HIS_ORDER_NO) WHERE KIT_NO = #{kit_no}
